en.name: Closing sales
en.coverDescription: You have prepared your sales meeting thoroughly and know your pitch like the back of your hand? Now it's time for action: the presentation. Show you client how they will benefit from the product or service you want to offer while meeting their objections, before sealing the deal with these straightforward guides.

fr.name: Conclure sa vente
fr.coverDescription: Vous avez bien préparé votre réunion de vente et connaissez parfaitement votre argumentaire? Le moment est venu d'agir: la présentation. Montrez à vos clients comment ils vont bénéficier du produit ou du service que vous souhaitez offrir tout en répondant à leurs objections, avant de sceller l'accord avec ces guides simples.

de.name: Den Verkauf abschließen
de.coverDescription:
DEMNÄCHST BALD AUF DEUTSCH
You have prepared your sales meeting thoroughly and know your pitch like the back of your hand? Now it's time for action: the presentation. Show you client how they will benefit from the product or service you want to offer while meeting their objections, before sealing the deal with these straightforward guides.
